name: Keith Enfinger
text: Best salad bar in Tennessee. Taco pizza is amazing, Zeke and his crew are the nicest people around. I'm literally in there 2-3 times a week for the salad bar. Great restaurant been looking for a Pizza Inn for years since the one in Shelbyville closed 20+ years.

name: Selina Gallegos
text: The staff here is incredibly kind and welcoming!!! We loved the food and they were happy to make us our favorite pizza!!! The bathroom was clean and well stocked! I also loved the music and atmosphere! We can't wait to come back!!!!

name: Eva Pierce
text: This place has a great buffet. Everything is hot and fresh. The Salad bar was super fresh with lots of options especially for a small business. The buffet has both pizza and pasta options. The price was really good too!

name: Jessica Spray
text: My husband and I had lunch at the buffet today & it was terrific! The variety of pizzas was nice, the salad bar was great & the restaurant was clean. We've been to some buffets in the past & the floor is sticky or there is a general mess, ‚Ä¶More

name: Jamel Jeansonne
text: Great food, staff and prices.

name: Jeremy Searcy

name: Ben Weaver
text: This place is awesome. Excellent pizza buffet for good prices. The specials on take out and delivery are very good too. I love that loaded potato pizza!

name: Cecilia Texas

text: I love pizza inn

text: Pizza was hot and fresh. Salad bar was bomb. And they had like this oreo dessert (served hot) and i had bout 3 slices of that alone. text: Great pizza and really nice staff. I didn't get to try the buffet but it looks really good so I'd definitely give it a try.

text: Friendly staff. Pizza and cheese bread was delicious with a wonderful, yet delicate, crunch to the crust. Hot marinara sauce available upon request, pairs extremely well with the cheese bread and pizza crust. Definitely recommend the cinnamon dessert; it  has an amazing creamy middle layer. Sooo good! Will eat here again!
